about_the_game:
Squa Ca Dri is an exhilarating, fast-paced racing game that challenges your reflexes as you run through the chaotic flow of traffic! Whether you're dodging buses, weaving between trucks, or sprinting past cars, you'll need sharp skills and quick thinking to stay ahead. With multiple game modes, Squa Ca Dri offers a variety of thrilling challenges for players of all levels.

Game Modes:

  • Career Mode: Start your journey as a rookie and rise through the ranks by completing a series of challenging levels. Earn upgrades and unlock new routes as you master the art of high-speed dodging.

  • Endless Mode: Test your endurance and see how far you can run! The further you go, the more intense the traffic gets. How long can you survive the rush?

  • Time Attack Mode: Beat the clock! Speed through the busy streets while racing against time. Can you reach the finish line before time runs out?

  • Chase Mode: The heat is on! Run at full throttle while evading relentless pursuers. Will you escape their clutches, or will they catch you?

Featuring stunning visuals, dynamic environments, and heart-pounding action, Squa Ca Dri will keep you on the edge of your seat. Are you ready to take on the streets and conquer the flow of transport?

name: Squa Ca Dri

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvida GTX
  • Storage: 333 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvida GTX
  • Storage: 333 MB available space
